import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Shield, CheckCircle, XCircle, Clock, Eye, Star, AlertTriangle, FileText, User, Camera, MessageSquare, Flag, Upload, StarIcon } from 'lucide-react'; import LoadingSpinner from '../components/LoadingSpinner'; import { useAuth, PERMISSIONS } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { useContractors } from '../contexts/ContractorContext'; const QualityAssurance = () => { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const { user, hasPermission, refreshUser } = useAuth(); const { contractors: allContractors, getStats, loadContractors } = useContractors(); const [showComplaintForm, setShowComplaintForm] = useState(false); const [showRatingForm, setShowRatingForm] = useState(false); const [complaint, setComplaint] = useState({ contractorId: '', subject: '', description: '', category: 'general' }); const [rating, setRating] = useState({ contractorId: '', projectId: '', rating: 5, feedback: '' }); // Check if user has verifier permissions if (!hasPermission(PERMISSIONS.VERIFY_CREDENTIALS)) { return (

You don't have permission to access this page.

); } if (loading) { return ; } return (

Rating: {contractor.rating || 'N/A'} Projects: {contractor.completedProjects || 0} Quality Score: {contractor.qualityScore || 'N/A'}
))}
)}

setComplaint({...complaint, subject: e.target.value})} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md" required />
